body:
Men definitely look more attractive if they are well groomed. One important aspect of the entire look is the kind of shoes a man wears. Shoes can do wonders to the overall look. So guys need to be careful when choosing the right kind of shoes.

There are numerousstyles of men’s shoes that are available in the market. The great aspect of being a man is that you don’t have to pay a fortune for shoes. You can make one time investment that could be put to use for a long time. You can do perfect well if you stick to few carefully chosen shoes. All you have to do is invest in some sensible pairs and take care of them and you’re good to go for years.

Every man needs to have certain shoes in his wardrobe besides the conventional pair of sneakers that he owns. He should have shoes that are suitable for different occasions. You should have formal as well as semi formal pair of shoes. Youneed to have a shiny pair of dress shoes that you can wear on formal occasions. Other than that a comfortable pair or sandals is also a must. Besides these one pair of attention-grabbing boots would also look fabulous.

Any lace-up [mens's shoes](http://adclout.com/men-shoes-cat-26?keywords=semi+formal) that don’t rise above the ankles are known as oxfords. There are many varieties that are available within the oxford category. When you are selecting an oxford for yourself, keep in mind that you don’t settle for anything that is less than genuine leather. Genuine leather shoes can never go wrong.Black lace-up shoes is a must for all men. They will work with everything from jeans to suits.

It is very important that your shoes are clean and smooth at all times. Shoes look really nice when they are polished. Your formal shoes would look fabulous when they are maintained and polished regularly. Sandals are considered more of semi formal shoes and you can wear them on any occasion when you need to dress up casually. So the next time you go shopping make sure that you buy the right kind of shoes for your self!
